name: Test_for_issues_in_a_public_package_by_name_and_version
description: You can test `npm` packages for issues according to their name and version.

packageName.description: The package name. For scoped packages, **must** be url-encoded, so to test "@angular/core" version 4.3.2, one should `GET /test/npm/%40angular%2Fcore/4.3.2`.

org.description: The organization to test the package with. See "The Snyk organization for a request" above.
